title: WI officials drop fines for dance studio that hosted 'Nutcracker' performance during COVID

description: Some 400 million people visit U.S. beaches each year — and many of them could be exposed to hazardous bacteria, says a new report on beach pollution from Environment America.

description: The scuffling Baltimore Orioles beat the New York Yankees 6-3 on Wednesday night as top prospect Colton Cowser had a hit and RBI in his MLB debut for the Orioles.

title: Cleaning wood cutting boards with lemons and salt: Does it work?
description: Cleaning experts on TikTok claim grime can be removed from wood cutting boards with lemon juice and salt. Here's why the two-ingredient concoction might work.

description: The Minnesota Twins shutout the Kansas City Royals 4-0 on Wednesday night behind Pablo López's dominant complete game shutout as he struck out 12 Royals hitters.
